nodes.description: Number of nodes to be used for the job.

queue.description: Queue to submit the job to. Options are high, low, or local.

resources.description: Additional resources required for the job, specified in PBS format.

scratch.description: Scratch directory for the job. If not set, the environmental variable SCRATCH will be used.

threads.description: Number of threads to be used for OpenMP parallelization.

mpi.description: Number of processes used for MPI parallelization.

wien2k_version.description: Version of WIEN2k to be used for the job.
